mapper.select: SELECT S.SITTER_NUMBER, SPF.SITTER_PROFILE_FILE_NAME, SPF.SITTER_PROFILE_UPLOAD_PATH, SPF.SITTER_PROFILE_UUID FROM TBL_SITTER_PROFILE_FILE SPF JOIN TBL_SITTER S ON SPF.SITTER_NUMBER = S.SITTER_NUMBER WHERE S.SITTER_NUMBER = #{sitterNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SITTER_PROFILE_FILE (SITTER_PROFILE_NUMBER, SITTER_NUMBER, SITTER_PROFILE_FILE_NAME, SITTER_PROFILE_UUID, SITTER_PROFILE_UPLOAD_PATH) VALUES (SEQ_SITTER_PROFILE_FILE.NEXTVAL, #{sitterNumber}, #{sitterProfileFileName}, #{sitterProfileUuid}, #{sitterProfileUploadPath})
